properties.body:
NGA MARITIME SAFETY OFFICE STATUS AND SUPPORT.
COVID-19 UPDATE.
 1. NGA IS EXECUTING A MISSION CRITICAL POSTURE
    FOR MANNING AND SUPPORT DURING THE COVID-19
    PANDEMIC. NGA WILL MAINTAIN THE REQUISITE
    STAFFING AND CAPACITY TO OPERATE THE 24/7
    NAVSAFETY WATCH, PUBLISH THE WEEKLY NOTICE
    TO MARINERS AND PROVIDE DNC CRITICAL
    CORRECTIONS.
 2. ALL OTHER SERVICES AND PRODUCTS WILL BE
    SUPPORTED ON A CASE BY CASE BASIS AS MISSION
    NEEDS DICTATE.
 3. NGA REMAINS ACCESSIBLE THROUGH ITS NORMAL
    POINTS OF CONTACT.
 4. FOR URGENT SERVICE, CONTACT NGA NAVSAFETY,
    DSN: 547 5455,
    COMM: 800 362 6289 OR 571 557 5455,
    E-MAIL: NAVSAFETY@NGA.MIL OR
    MSG TO NGA NAVSAFETY WASHINGTON DC.
